snippet: The first U.S. patient to test positive for the often deadly Middle East Respiratory Syndrome virus will remain isolated at home after he is released from an Indiana hospital, officials said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: First U.S. MERS Patient to Be Isolated at Home After Discharge
headline.main: First U.S. MERS Patient to Be Isolated at Home After Discharge

lead_paragraph: The first U.S. patient to test positive for the often deadly Middle East Respiratory Syndrome virus will remain isolated at home after he is released from an Indiana hospital, officials said on Tuesday.
